sen.j: 五社 英雄（ごしゃ ひでお、本名同じ字で「ごしゃ・えいゆう」、1929年2月26日 - 1992年8月30日）は、映画監督・脚本家。
sen.e: Hideo GOSHA (五社英雄, his real name is 'Eiyu GOSHA' with the same characters, February 26, 1929 - August 30, 1992) was a film director and a playwright.
Hideo GOSHA (五社英雄, his real name was 'Eiyu GOSHA' with the same characters, February 26, 1929 - August 30, 1992) was a film director and a playwright.
Hideo GOSHA (五社英雄, his real name was 'Eiyu GOSHA' with the same characters, February 26, 1929 - August 30, 1992) was a film director and a playwright.
He was from Tokyo.
He was from Tokyo.
He was from Tokyo.
He graduated from Meiji University Faculty of Commerce.
He graduated from Meiji University Faculty of Commerce.
He graduated from Meiji University Faculty of Commerce.

sen.j: ニッポン放送を経て、フジテレビジョンへ。
sen.e: He worked for Fuji Television Network, Inc after working for Nippon Broadcasting System, Incorporated.
He worked for Fuji Television Network, Inc after working for Nippon Broadcasting System, Incorporated.
He worked for Fuji Television Network, Inc after working for Nippon Broadcasting System, Incorporated.
Career
Career
Career

sen.j: テレビドラマの『刑事』や『ジキルとハイド』では、プロデュースも担当。
sen.e: He was also in charge of production of TV dramas, "Detective" and "Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde."
He was also in charge of production of the TV dramas, "Detective" and "Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde."
He was also in charge of production of the TV dramas, "Detective" and "Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde."

sen.j: 原作・脚本・監督とこなす映画監督でもあった。
sen.e: He was a film director working as an author, a writer and a director.
He was a film director working as an author, a writer and a director.
He was a film director working as an author, a writer and a director.

sen.j: 『ひらけ!ポンキッキ』の企画にも携わり、企画書を提出した人物でもある。
sen.e: He was also involved in the planning of "Hirake! Ponkikki," and he was the one who submitted the plan proposal.
sen.cmt: ひらけ！ポンキッキは、Open! the Ponkikki（定訳不明）となっていたので、Hirake! Ponkikkiにしました。こっちの方がネットでヒットします。
sen.e: He was also involved in the planning of "Hirake! Ponkikki," and he was the one who submitted the proposal plan.
He was also involved in the planning of "Hirake! Ponkikki," and he was the one who submitted the proposal plan.

sen.j: 代表作は時代劇『三匹の侍』。
sen.e: One of his representative works is a period drama, "Three Outlaw Samurai."
sen.cmt: 三匹の侍はThree Samurai（定訳不明）でしたので、Three Outlaw Samuraiにしました。 http://www.amazon.com/Three-Outlaw-Samurai/dp/B0006Z8FWE/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1259582652&sr=8-1
sen.e: One of his representative works is a period drama, "Three Outlaw Samurai."
One of his representative works is a period drama, "Three Outlaw Samurai."

sen.j: テレビドラマ放送後に映画化され、続編も作られた。
sen.e: This was made into a film after broadcast of the TV drama, and the sequel was also made.
This was made into a film after the broadcast of the TV drama, and a sequel was also made.
This was made into a film after the broadcast of the TV drama, and a sequel was also made.

sen.j: また時代劇監督としても知られ、数々の時代劇作品を撮り続けた。
sen.e: He was also known as a director of period dramas, and kept shooting a number of period dramas.
He was also known as a director of period dramas, and continued shooting a number of such dramas.
He was also known as a director of period dramas, and continued shooting a number of such dramas.

sen.j: 1980年に銃刀法違反の容疑で逮捕され、フジテレビを依願退職する。
sen.e: He was arrested on suspicion of weapons violation in 1980, and he resigned Fuji Television voluntarily.
He was arrested on suspicion of weapons violation in 1980, and he resigned from Fuji Television voluntarily.
He was arrested on suspicion of weapons violation in 1980, and he resigned from Fuji Television voluntarily.

sen.j: その後の活動再開第1作が『鬼龍院華子の生涯』である。
sen.e: His first work after resuming his activity was "The life of Hanako KIRYUIN."
His first work after resuming his activity was "The life of Hanako KIRYUIN."
His first work after resuming his activity was "The life of Hanako KIRYUIN."

sen.j: 1985年には自ら映画制作プロダクション「五社プロダクション」を設立。
sen.e: In 1985, he established 'Gosha Production,' a film making firm by himself.
In 1985, he established 'Gosha Production,' a film-making company by himself.
In 1985, he established 'Gosha Production,' a film-making company by himself.

sen.j: また、映画『世界最強のカラテ キョクシン』（1985年、極真映画製作委員会）の総監修や、映画『陽炎II KAGERO』（1996年、松竹・バンダイビジュアル）の脚本監修も手がけていた。
sen.e: He also took charge of supervising of "The world strongest karate, Kyokushin" (1985, by Kyokushin film production committee), and supervising of the screenplay of "Kagero II" (1996, by Shochiku/Bandai Visual).
sen.cmt: 陽炎が、登録でYoenとなっていたのですが、どうもこの映画はKageroらしいので、左記の通りに翻訳。
sen.e: He also took charge of supervising of "The world strongest karate, Kyokushin" (1985, by Kyokushin film production committee), and supervising of the screenplay of "Kagero II" (1996, by Shochiku/Bandai Visual).

He also took charge of supervising of "The world strongest karate, Kyokushin" (1985, by Kyokushin film production committee), and supervising of the screenplay of "Kagero II" (1996, by Shochiku/Bandai Visual).

sen.j: 後年、監督としての名声を博して後に、二代目彫芳の手による刺青を、全身に彫ったことを娘に明かした。
sen.e: Later in his life after acquiring a reputation as a director, he revealed that he had got full-body tattoo by the second Horiyoshi.
Later in his life after acquiring a reputation as a director, he revealed that he had gotten a full-body tattoo by the second Horiyoshi.
Later in his life after acquiring a reputation as a director, he revealed to his daughter that he had gotten a full-body tattoo by the second Horiyoshi.
Noboru ANDO was his best friend.
Noboru ANDO was his best friend.
Noboru ANDO was his best friend.

sen.j: 『新三匹の侍』の企画段階で、五社自ら安藤をレギュラーに推薦して起用した。
sen.e: Gosha himself recommended and employed Ando as a regular member at the planning phase of "New Three Outlaw Samurai."
Gosha himself recommended and employed Ando as a regular member during the planning phase of "New Three Outlaw Samurai."
Gosha himself recommended and employed Ando as a regular member during the planning phase of "New Three Outlaw Samurai."
